meanings.definition: A person or business that offers goods or services at reduced prices.
meanings.sent1: The discounters at the store always have great deals on clothes.
meanings.sent2: I always look for discounters when I want to save money on groceries.
meanings.sent3: The discounters decided to have a sale on hats, but only the ones with stripes.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of regular prices, the discounters stood out like shining stars.
meanings.sent5: The discounters' shop was like a treasure trove of affordable treasures.

meanings.definition: The act of offering goods or services at reduced prices.
meanings.sent1: The discounters of the market made sure to advertise their sales.
meanings.sent2: During the holiday season, many businesses engage in discounters to attract customers.
meanings.sent3: The discounters' parade down the street was a sight to behold, with balloons and confetti.
meanings.sent4: The concept of discounters is like a magic spell that draws in eager shoppers.
meanings.sent5: The strategy of discounters can turn a slow day into a bustling one at the store.
